PAGE.TITLE: Dynamic loader
PAGE.CONTENT:
dlopenhttps://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man3/dlopen.3.html
enHTMLload a dynamic library file
dlclosehttps://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man3/dlopen.3.html
enHTMLunload a dynamic library file (an increment mechanism is used, unload is effectively performed only when the increment reaches zero)
dlsymhttps://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man3/dlsym.3.html
enHTMLreturn the address of a symbol given its name
dlvsymhttps://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man3/dlvsym.3.html
enHTML(GNU extension) return the address of a symbol given its name and version
dladdrhttps://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man3/dladdr.3.html
enHTML(GNU extension) return the name of a symbol given its address
dlerrorhttps://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man3/dlerror.3.html
enHTMLreturn a human readable string describing the most recent error

enHTML for an example of use.
